Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 12.4 with a standard deviation 2.6. The z-score of the person with 7.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -3.02
* -1.85
* -1.42

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.02: Incorrect
-1.85: Correct
-1.42: Incorrect
